author: cecilecaillol
body:
#### PR description:

Backport of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/39244

Addressing item 1 of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/39194: change L1 modules to start with l1t, sequences and tasks with L1T
Also addressing item 2 of the same issue: Fix hltTriggerSummaryAOD
Also addressing item 5 of the same issue: Verify the PSet cutset in L1TrackSelectionProducerExtended
title: [L1T] Backport - L1T modules/sequences/tasks renaming
